binding:binding.name: AllPlay Binding
binding:binding.description: The AllPlay binding integrates devices compatible with Qualcomm AllPlay.
binding:binding.author: Dominic Lerbs

parameter.name: rewindSkipTimeInSec
parameter.label: Rewind skip time (s)
parameter.description: Seconds to jump backwards if the rewind command is executed

parameter.name: fastForwardSkipTimeInSec
parameter.label: Fast forward skip time (s)
parameter.description: Seconds to jump forward if the fastforward command is executed
